name: GearedforVictory
author: OjamaJoe
notes: Hit KOG on 4/20, posting for the stats. Wish I had another PR to test; might have taken our Canadia. Divine Wrath ~sometimes~ helped. Could have taken that out too. I survived first round in ManLM's and PDS's tourneys over the weekend with this build...those two and Magpie's were my first tourneys so I hope to do better in the future! DM me if you want to practice together
